channel.title: Snowing i finally figured it out :P
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img393.imageshack.us/img393/8391/snowpicyi9.png[/img][/URL]
pwnage hahahahahha i found a way to do this server side while still making it so that a player can use a command to turn it off or on for that player only and no flickering either im not sure if its been done this way b4 but i just thought id come out here and brag in my spare time so whadya think?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 09:15:09 PM[/size][hr]any replys plz?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 09:22:26 PM[/size][hr]cmon ppl whadya think? i gots to know

item.title: Snowing i finally figured it out :P
item.dc:creator: @dark_magshin dark magshin
item.description:
@dark_magshin wrote:

well sry guys i gtg u guys see what u can make of that code on reply 3 gl with that i gtg to bed =[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 09:44:34 PM[/size][hr]i always say “its no fun to code somthing thats already been coded for you” thats why all these new server sources are massively gay and even worse than all the C & P [tuts] out there becouse you dont even have to know java to download a file
